thread.title: Senators Release Bill to Update Law Underpinning War on Terrorism

author: Byron Tau
title: Senators Release Bill to Update Law Underpinning War on Terrorism
text:
WASHINGTONâ€”A bipartisan group of senators on Monday released a proposal that seeks to modernize a 2001 law underpinning the war on terrorism, in what would be the first update of U.S. war powers in 16 years.
The new bill aims to replace the 2001 Authorization for Use of Military Force, or AUMF. The law was passed shortly after the Sept. 11, 2001 terrorist attacks and has provided legal justification for nearly two decades of military action against numerous terrorist groups across more than a dozen countries.
